医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
斯坦福大学的研究确定了六种抑郁症生物型以进行个性化治疗在不久的将来，抑郁症的筛查评估可能包括快速脑部扫描，以确定最佳治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Stanford-study-identizes-six-depression-biotypes-for-personalized-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Stanford-study-identizes-six-depression-biotypes-for-personalized-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df692a32-eadf-4222-b08c-4eaae05110ac Mon, 17 Jun 2024 09:51:48 -0400 Stanford study identifies six depression biotypes for personalized treatment
Gyros Protein Technologies 推出 Gyrolab 通用抗 AAV 试剂盒以支持基因治疗开发即用型试剂盒能够检测 AAV 载体的结合抗体，无需进行血清型特异性检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-introduces-Gyrolab-Generic-Anti-AAV-Kit-to-support-gene-therapy-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Gyros-Protein-Technologies-introduces-Gyrolab-Generic-Anti-AAV-Kit-to-support-gene-therapy-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dd97d68-6275-404d-bb59-31e6667e3877 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 09:21:00 -0400 Gyros Protein Technologies introduces Gyrolab Generic Anti-AAV Kit to support gene therapy development
HEALing 社区研究：数据驱动的干预并未降低阿片类药物相关的过量死亡率数据驱动的干预措施让社区迅速部署基于证据的做法，以减少阿片类药物相关的过量死亡——例如增加纳洛酮的分布和增加获得阿片类药物使用障碍药物的机会——但并没有导致阿片类药物相关的统计显着减少根据美国国立卫生研究院 HEALing（帮助结束长期成瘾）社区研究的结果，评估期间的服药过量死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/HEALing-Communities-Study-Data-driven-intervention-did-not-reduce-opioid-lated-overdose-death-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/HEALing-Communities-Study-Data-driven-intervention-did-not-reduce-opioid-lated-overdose-death-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7586f315-01fc-4898-93d0-5437a12866bd Mon, 17 Jun 2024 09:19:17 -0400 HEALing Communities Study: Data-driven intervention did not reduce opioid-related overdose death rates
INTEGRA Biosciences 宣布任命新董事会成员INTEGRA Biosciences 很高兴欢迎 Line Stigen Raquet 成为非执行董事会成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/INTEGRA-Biosciences-announces-the-appointment-of-a-new-board-member.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/INTEGRA-Biosciences-announces-the-appointment-of-a-new-board-member.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4ddbc62-d0fe-4ec7-8af4-e52e581c0eba Mon, 17 Jun 2024 09:05:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences announces the appointment of a new board member
Enterprise Therapeutics 任命 Renu Gupta 博士为首席医疗官，Janet Hammond 博士为非执行董事随着公司开始其主要资产的 2a 期临床试验，这些任命带来了额外的呼吸系统和后期临床阶段药物开发经验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Enterprise-Therapeutics-appoints-Dr-Renu-Gupta-as-Chief-Medical-Officer-and-Dr-Janet-Hammond-as-Non-Executive-导演.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Enterprise-Therapeutics-appoints-Dr-Renu-Gupta-as-Chief-Medical-Officer-and-Dr-Janet-Hammond-as-Non-Executive-导演.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fb7dfec-8080-4e0f-872e-34bd0e635425 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 08:46:00 -0400 Enterprise Therapeutics appoints Dr Renu Gupta as Chief Medical Officer and Dr Janet Hammond as Non-Executive Director
芬兰研究人员发现乳腺癌细胞重新激活的机制多年来，乳腺癌的治疗效果已经有所改善，但即使在体内没有癌症潜伏迹象很长时间后，乳腺癌的比例仍然会复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Finnish-researchers-discover-mechanism-behind-breast-cancer-cell-reactivation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Finnish-researchers-discover-mechanism-behind-breast-cancer-cell-reactivation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc890b14-21b5-47e5-bf36-40c52e4f443f Mon, 17 Jun 2024 08:14:00 -0400 Finnish researchers discover mechanism behind breast cancer cell reactivation
跨境肿瘤委员会加强对欧洲罕见妇科癌症的护理一项为期六年的研究结果显示，来自欧洲不同国家的癌症专家组成的跨境肿瘤委员会通过虚拟方式召开会议，审查欧洲各地患有复杂罕见妇科癌症的个体患者的治疗情况，提出了新的治疗建议并增加了参与临床试验的机会将于 2024 年 ESMO 妇科癌症大会上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Cross-border-tumor-boards-enhance-care-for-rare-gynecological-cancers-across-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Cross-border-tumor-boards-enhance-care-for-rare-gynecological-cancers-across-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=169e3de1-d450-46d1-8e6f-bbe1c97fa421 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:57:00 -0400 Cross-border tumor boards enhance care for rare gynecological cancers across Europe
研究显示，从 2008 年到 2021 年，美国妊娠期慢性高血压发病率翻了一番根据《高血压》今天发表的最新研究，2008 年至 2021 年间，美国患有慢性高血压或妊娠期慢性高血压的人数翻了一番，而妊娠期抗高血压药物的处方和配药比例仍然较低，但稳定在 60% ，美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Study-reveals-doubling-of-chronic-hypertension-in-pregnancy-from-2008-to-2021-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Study-reveals-doubling-of-chronic-hypertension-in-pregnancy-from-2008-to-2021-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=369ae2e6-ebd0-4104-a49a-d73b647698a1 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:50:47 -0400 Study reveals doubling of chronic hypertension in pregnancy from 2008 to 2021 in the U. S.
研究揭示拉丁美洲健康老龄化的多种风险因素今天发表在《自然老龄化》杂志上的一项开创性研究揭示了影响拉丁美洲健康老龄化的风险因素的显着异质性，并强调了当前大脑健康模型的局限性，该模型主要基于高收入国家的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Study-reveals-diverse-risk-factors-for-healthy-aging-in-Latin-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Study-reveals-diverse-risk-factors-for-healthy-aging-in-Latin-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abbc0e7b-970b-4147-a5c8-5357151b646f Mon, 17 Jun 2024 07:37:51 -0400 Study reveals diverse risk factors for healthy aging in Latin America
CSHL 研究人员揭示 MED12 是基底样胰腺癌的关键参与者事情并不总是像看上去的那样。以胰腺癌为例。在多达十分之一的案例中，研究人员记录了一种特殊的特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/CSHL-researchers-reveal-MED12-as-key-player-in-basal-like-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/CSHL-researchers-reveal-MED12-as-key-player-in-basal-like-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2802705-1bc5-4aea-aff8-e132f341d27a Mon, 17 Jun 2024 06:57:17 -0400 CSHL researchers reveal MED12 as key player in basal-like pancreatic cancer
